item.title: testing as debugging
item.description: I’m writing my first tests at the moment. I’ve been rather enamoured with the idea of testing for about six months now, but haven’t had much of a chance to work on research. So, I’m finally now sitting down to begin my first package in earnest, and thus writing my first tests. I recently saw Kara Woo speak at R-Ladies Seattle, and she made a compelling case for debugging with rigour.
